item.title: By: Maduagwu Paul
item.dc:creator: Maduagwu Paul
item.description: Always wanted to read an in depth article on Tezos. I like it a lot, not much for the dapps, but the freedom to choose between different profitable bakers.
item.content:encoded: Always wanted to read an in depth article on Tezos. I like it a lot, not much for the dapps, but the freedom to choose between different profitable bakers.

item.title: By: Abdul
item.dc:creator: Abdul
item.description: Tezos is one of the best alts out there, the Proof of stake makes it undeniable. To the moon????
item.content:encoded: Tezos is one of the best alts out there, the Proof of stake makes it undeniable. To the moon????
